page.title: 05SESSAY VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: The{1980's}brought education here into the computer age providing a new dimension for learning. Nevertheless emphasis is still on learning to read and write, developing number sense and understanding mathematical concepts. The{curriculum}includes English, Scripture, Nature Study, Science, History, Geography, taught as integrated topics, providing interest and stimulation to allow children to discover information for themselves, working at their own speed; also music, arts, games including swimming and field sports. There is a flourishing{Parent-Teacher {Association}helping with fund-raising. {Staff}comprises Headmistress, 3 assistants and 4 ancillary staff. The 70 children are happy, polite, well- dressed, well-nourished, intelligent and a pleasure to teach.
